alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Grady; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 8:24PM CDT until April 23 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Comanche County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 915 PM CDT. * At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 6 miles north of Faxon, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lawton, Marlow, Elgin, Fletcher, Sterling, Faxon, eastern Fort Sill and Central High. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect for the warned area. Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
